This is a tutorial

This is a tutorial on how to use the Astro static site generator.

What is Astro?

Astro is a static site generator that uses React components to generate static HTML pages.

What is this tutorial about?

This tutorial is about how to use Astro to generate a static site.

What is the purpose of this tutorial?

This tutorial is meant to be a simple tutorial on how to use Astro to generate a static site.
